EmailTemplate.name: VinPro Contact Information:Aaron Scheidt
EmailTemplate.subject: VinPro Contact Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Aaron Scheidt is your new VinPro. If for any reason your VinPro is out of the office or cannot assist you, your call will be directed to Erin Morse. Please see below for contact information.
Aaron Scheidt VinPro Midwest Region VinSolutions.com aaron.scheidt@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45811 C: 913-956-9268 (Assigned VinPro)
Erin Morse VinPro Midwest Region VinSolutions.com erin.morse@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45808 (Alternate VinPro)
Support related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST) Customer Portal: The portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
In order to better assist you, please make sure to create a ticket with the support department and send your assigned VinPro an email with the ticket number. By providing this information, your VinPro can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
